translations.knowledge.contentCues.populateModal.body: Content Cues has automatically populated the best agent response, suggested labels and an article title using information from your support ticket. translations.knowledge.reachNewHeights.heading: Reach new heights together
translations.knowledge.keepKnowledgeRelevant.heading: Keep knowledge relevant...
translations.knowledge.keepKnowledgeRelevant.text:
Assign updates across the team. Use your collective knowledge to collaborate on articles and build on your self-service.
%{learnMoreLink}
translations.knowledge.peaceOfMind.heading: Peace of mind...
translations.knowledge.peaceOfMind.text:
Take an existing article and create a work in progress version of it while leaving the original article safe and sound in your Help Center.
%{learnMoreLink}
translations.knowledge.getTheBallRolling.heading: Get the ball rolling...
translations.knowledge.getTheBallRolling.text:
Start an article, save it, assign it to a teammate, and review their contributions before publishing.
%{learnMoreLink}
